item.title: Biffa bin uncollected and accumulating rubbish, 20th June
item.description:
This Biffa bin has been uncollected for several months since the closure of recent businesses but keeps filling with rubbish. When it is full, people leave rubbish including full bin bags next to it. These are collected but the full Biffa bin is not. The rubbish in there must be very old!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Nuxley Road, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
